Procedure.Proc: Address the Letter to Dean, Student Welfare
Get your Presidents' and Faculty Co ordinator's Signature in order
Submit the letter to DSW office and collect it after 2 hours
Show the signed copy to the school office to allocate a room.
Carry the letter till the event is over and then document it for your annual report.

Procedure.Query: Apply for a new hall ticket
Procedure.Proc: Write a request letter and get it signed at COE office (SJT)
Submit it at Finance Office(MB), Pay the fine and submit the receipt to COE office
